sentences.sContent: The brain cells are inactive during sleep.
sentences.sCn: 在睡觉时脑细胞不活跃。

sentences.sContent: Young people are becoming politically inactive.
sentences.sCn: 年轻人变得不热衷政治了。

synos.tran: 不活跃的；不活动的；怠惰的；闲置的

words.tran: 静止；不活泼；休止状态；不放射性
[生物] 失活；[化学] 钝化（作用）
使不活动；使不活泼；阻止活动

trans.tranOther: not doing anything, not working, or not moving
